channel.title: How do i get npc doing emotes?

item.title: How do i get npc doing emotes?
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

the help section they say only… nah not gonna help… no time for it \

could anyone help me to get a npc do a emote… plz plz plz

credits :::: ::::::

rep++ :::: ::::::

Quote
if (npcs.npcType == 2244)
{
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3)
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Happy New Year 2007!”;
}
}

could anyone give that npc a stupid emote… doesn’t matther what for …
il change it…
only need to know how???

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get npc doing emotes?
